title: Word Search
description: Given an m x n grid of characters board and a string word, return 'Yes' if word exists in the grid, or 'No' otherwise. The word can be constructed from letters of sequentially adjacent cells, where adjacent cells are horizontally or vertically neighboring. The same letter cell may not be used more than once.
input_format: Rows and columns count (m n) on the first line, followed by the grid characters line by line, and the target word on the last line.

sample_test_cases.input:
3 4
A B C E
S F C S
A D E E
ABCCED
